lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I am making a donation in honor of Tim and Karen (their wedding is this Saturday, July 14). They asked that friends donate to a worthy organization in lieu of buying them wedding presents. Kiva was on their list of suggested recipients. After one visit to this website, I'm hooked!
lender.occupational_info: I design printed catalogs, DVD covers, and the website for a company that educates people on budget travel to Europe.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: As a member of Ethical Society Mid Rivers and an Ethical Humanist I hope to, in some small way, enrich the lives of those that are not as well off as myself and inspire others to so as well.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed with more that I need and feel others deserve the same chances I've been given.
lender.occupational_info: As well as driving zamboni I clean the building and do all the repairs.

lender.name: SYP
lender.loan_because: People should help one another be able to have the best lives possible.
lender.occupational_info: My expertise is marketing and selling products and services online.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: Sabyasachi
lender.loan_because: I am the Owner of Indian Based Trading distributor Company . I require more funds for develop infrusturcture and get more business by through aquare materials .
lender.occupational_info:
We are basically Importer is distributor of industrial raw materials items such like Used Rails , Thermal Coal . We have enough enquiry of purchaser and seller . We have also having business opportunity of trading through dumping the materials in India . We have successfully tie up Thailand based Company for selling of Thermal coal and along with we start receiving lots of materials order form there end . We need funding of 50 million USD oriented venture capitalist initially on joint venture partnership . We don’t need fund at this moment we need to open the letter of credit on to our supplier name . Please call us at +919836378939
Sabyasachi Banerjee

lender.name: S.J.
lender.occupational_info: Ein Lehrer ist ein Lehrer ist ein Lehrer (A teacher is a teacher is a teacher)

lender.name: Ella Z.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It's a simple, direct way to support people's initiatives to improve their lives.

lender.name: Kellagh&Mike
lender.loan_because: My husband and I both work for my parent's small business, I believe strongly in the entrepreneur and am excited to participate in this program!
lender.occupational_info: I design and create newspaper advertisements, fliers, t-shirts and posters and my husband is a movie theatre manager and I.T. specialist.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: His grace escapes from me. I am a rusty vessel carrying pure water.

lender.name: Sue

lender.name: Tallak
lender.loan_because: I want to help others create something.

lender.name: jean-nicolas
lender.loan_because: I believe that entrepreneurship will make this world better. I support people who want to progress.

lender.name: Richie Banks
lender.loan_because: I have been so blesssed and i felt it will be great if i get to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info:
I am Mr Richie Banks, a Reputable, Legitimate & an accredited money Lender. I loan money out to individuals in need of financial assistance. Do you have a bad credit or you are in need of money to pay bills? i want to use this medium to inform you that i render reliable beneficiary assistance as I'll be glad to offer you a loan.
Services Rendered include:
*Refinance *Home Improvement *Inventor Loans *Auto Loans *Debt Consolidation *Line of Credit *Second Mortgage *Business Loans *Personal Loans *International Loans
Please write back if interested. Upon Response, you'll be mailed a Loan application form to fill. (No social security and no credit check, 100% Guaranteed!) I Look forward permitting me to be of service to you.
Sincerely, Richie Banks Managing Director, fLoans Serv. Co banks_loanequity1@yahoo.com

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Love to help create wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student in mathematics working towards a doctorate degree (PhD).

lender.name: CARLOS ORMENO
lender.loan_because:
I WANT TO BUY TECHNICAL TOOLS TO FIX DONATE'S COMPUTERS TO SEND OR GIFT TO PEOPLE (THEY AFFORD TO BUY IT). HERE IN UNITED STATES OR OUTSIDE THE COUNTRY.
ALSO I WILL TO TEACH TO THE PEOPLE ABOUT FIX AND MAINTENANCE COMPUTER AS A NEW CAREER O SECOND JOB.
lender.occupational_info: THIS A LITTLE DROP IN WHOLE SEA. I WANT TO THE OPPORTUNITY TO DEVELOPMENT ALL MY SKILL AND TRANSFER TO MY KNOWLEDGE TO THE PEOPLE.

lender.name: Rajesh
lender.loan_because: To wipeout Starvation.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I'm excited by the empowerment and opportunities just a small loan can create. The money I loan with was raised with an intern team at JP Morgan Chase in New York during Summer 2007.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I like the concept of Pay it Forward
lender.occupational_info: I mostly do tumor/cancer work

lender.name: Marian
lender.loan_because: It sometimes seems that only people who don't need money can get the money they need. Small businesses can change lives and communities in big ways.
lender.occupational_info: I make up stories about people in extraordinary circumstances figuring out how to deal with problems while becoming better human beings.

lender.name: ampersat
lender.loan_because: My loan is far better than any charity.
lender.occupational_info: I build things and help others to build things.

lender.name: Masha
lender.loan_because: I believe in the difference this will make in a person's life.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Frankie
lender.loan_because: It is important to put our money where our hearts are.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to help others.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I don't need as much money now
lender.occupational_info: Community service, before and after retireing

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in need and I like that I can see who I help and be able to follow their progress out of the poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I'm living in Gothenburg in Sweden and I work at Volvo with the development of the gearboxes for heavy trucks.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I feel this is an important way to help fight poverty, one individual at a time. It also is a far more personal way to assist others and rather than simply giving money, this is a way to lend money to someone who has a small business and is generating their own income.

lender.name: Sue&Ken
lender.loan_because: We all need help at some point in our lives. This is a great way to share across the miles.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I can. And it's the right thing to do. Someone once told me, "You're may only be one person to the whole world, but you just might be the whole world to one person."
lender.occupational_info: I help people to find better ways to do what they do and to enjoy their work more. I help people to feel a greater sense of contribution to the whole. And I like to ride my bike.

lender.name: Megin
lender.occupational_info: I work for a state-based advocacy organization (NGO) that works toward equal civil and human rights for lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender people. I am also a mom of two. I am married to [http://www.kiva.org/lender/scott4004].

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I think a small effort on many peoples part can greatly help someone

lender.name: Bart and Emily
lender.loan_because: We read 'Banker to the Poor' and are committed to the cause of microlending. We are also involved in The Townships Project, a microcredit charity focused on South African entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: The good Lord has blessed me with many gifts. I want to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an art museum. My job is to help raise money for the organization.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Poverty needs to be eradicated, but just giving money to people has proven ineffective. I really believe in the way Kiva does what it does, and I plan to keep helping as long as possible. My favorite part is that when the money gets repaid, I can help somebody else!
lender.occupational_info: It's very simple: as an entrepreneur I look for needs that people have and create ways to satisfy those needs. See a need, fill a need.

lender.name: The Fat Pack
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can! How simple is that??
lender.occupational_info: We're a group of friends from different walks of life... and a very fortunate bunch we are!!

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: This seems a better way to help people help themselves than traditional big money projects.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I believe this method gets money directly into the hands of the people who really need it. I don't want my efforts to help out, to be shanghaied by a corrupt government and end up in some dictators Swiss bank account.

lender.name: Jules
lender.loan_because: I want to improve people's lives and see them succeed
lender.occupational_info: I live my life to the fullest and try to brighten other people's days.

lender.name: Merle and Edith
lender.loan_because: God cares about the poor. Deuteronomy 15:7 - 8, "If there is among you a poor man of your brethren, within any of the gates in your land which the Lord your God is giving you, you shall not harden your heart nor shut your hand from your poor brother, but you shall open your hand wide to him and willingly lend him sufficient for his need, whatever he needs."

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: I need money to make my own buisness, pay my student loans and be a extraordinary person in this world and make the difference.
lender.occupational_info: My work are made candels, insiense and crafts like soaps.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves puts the power in their hands.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I want to help. I think this is a really positive way to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to communicate that have had strokes, head injuries and other types illnesses that affect their speech and language.

lender.name: Maya & Lois
lender.loan_because: When I heard about this I felt like this is a way I could be connected to the person I hope to benefit.
lender.occupational_info: I help clean up groundwater.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: This is a great way that I can make a difference in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I value the idea of people directly helping others to develop and prosper.
lender.occupational_info: We renovate older homes to increase their beauty and function. Our intention is to serve our clients, our selves and our community, and to continue to refine and improve our skills and understanding.

lender.name: Allen
lender.loan_because: I believe that money is meant to be spent.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: "where you live should not determine whether you live." -Bono
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Webster University in Saint Louis, Missouri. I am also co-chairman of ONE Saint Louis which seeks to inspire individuals to take action to end extreme poverty by lobbying their politicians to support Foreign Poverty Development Assistance and the Millenium Development Goals.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: My uncle gave me a gift certificate to Kiva when I finished high school. I hope to give some of my own money to Kiva because I like the idea of helping people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student, and I will be entering a university next year. I need a summer job in order to pay for things while I am at school, so I work at a local pool. I watch the children who are swimming in the pool, I make sure that everyone follows the pool rules, and if I see anyone who is drowning, I rescue them.

lender.name: Lily
lender.loan_because: No reason in particular - I just like jumping in leaves !
lender.occupational_info: My job is crawling, pooping, eating, & playing.

lender.name: luca
lender.loan_because: from anyone according to his possibilities (or at least the cost of a pizza!!!)...
lender.occupational_info: Working for an all-news broadcasting service, nightshift

lender.name: joseph
lender.loan_because: i have so much more than my fair share

lender.name: Juliana
lender.loan_because: We need to help one another. These people are working, donating money to them helps them further their cause and better themselves. These are not people trying to take the easy way out.
lender.occupational_info: I work on political campaigns

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I write about people who have died for a newspaper - also known as an obituary writer.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: Of my children. I want them to learn that no matter how little we have, we can always share with those who's need is greater than our own.
lender.occupational_info: I sell things online to people I never meet, but sometimes talk to daily on the computer. I guess you'd say I'm in sales.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I don't think that our time, talents and life are to be spent building bigger barns for ourselves that we are going to just leave behind. I think we are to actively join in with the God who is putting the world back together again.

lender.name: Kim
lender.occupational_info: Recent college graduate/aspiring writer and historian.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people around the world, especially my fellow women. Together we can build a world where everyone has a job in a peaceful and prosperous country. I know that I am blessed with education in a rich country, and that I have a responsibility to help other people who were not born so lucky. It feels good to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying International Politics and Spanish at Penn State University. I have visited a lot of countries on the program Semester at Sea: Puerto Rico, Brazil, South Africa, Mauritius, India, Malaysia, Vietnam, China, Japan, Hawaii, Cost Rica, and through the Panama Canal. I learned that the world is beautiful, and that children are the same wonderful little beings everywhere.

lender.name: Kashia
lender.loan_because: This is my way of making a better world. I believe it is important to make sure everybody has a chance to succeed in life.
lender.occupational_info: I attended Colorado State University where I earned two Bachelor's degrees in Business Administration and Human Development & Family Studies. Currently I own and teach at Caterpillar's Leaf Preschool and Child Care.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I've set aside 1% of my total income to give away, because if we all did AND we invested in one another and a social safety net, we'd have a much, much better world. I am committed to international human development and I am on the edge of my seat, hoping Kiva will make a real difference.
lender.occupational_info: I specialize in the smart design, evaluation and improvement of mission-driven organizations.

lender.name: Anthony Romney
lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve their lives. I really like the Kiva program and I hope it continues to grow.

lender.name: AdQuantify
lender.occupation: Rich Media Ads / Search Engine Optimization
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is required. For excellence can be obtained if you care more than others think is wise, risk more than others think is safe, dream more than others think is practical, and expect more than others think is possible.
lender.occupational_info: We distribute rich media ads and manage search engine optimization.With AdQuantify’s IntentSignal™ technology, consumers can interact with an ad just as rich and full-featured as a complete web site, without leaving the site and content they were already browsing. The result: improved ad effectiveness including increased branding and conversion opportunity, without the negative experience associated with other intrusive technologies, such as pop-ups or interstitials.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to the world being a better place and this is an amazing way to do that!
lender.occupational_info: I coach people dealing with health issues

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: Every little bit can count. I am especially interested in helping women who want become financially independent.
lender.occupational_info: In my work. I try to help families prepare for and deal with the death of loved ones. Most of my clients have more money than they know what to do with. I get to see the ill effects of having too much money.

lender.name: Igor
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves to make themselves successful in life.

lender.name: Andrie
lender.loan_because: I want my bussiness running well, so i can help my parents
lender.occupational_info: Now, i'am focus in refill toner for laserjet printer.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I like to help others who are trying to help themselves, and I believe in karma.
lender.occupational_info: Real Estate

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: in my life time I have been blessed to have people put their faith in me and have loaned me money to pursue my dreams and help me better my life. I believe what goes around comes around...it is my turn. It is a worth while cause and a great way to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: After running my own business for nearly 10 years, I am now working as a Social Worker in a Skilled Nursing Facility and do art and Photography in my free time. I also enjoy spending time with my dog and my family and walking for good health.

lender.name: Arthur & Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want help make a difference in someone's life....

lender.name: Lorenz
lender.loan_because: It is a good idea to support people who have dreams and are willing to work hard for them! These people wouldn't get a credit otherwise respectively wouldn't be able to pay it back! Furthermore it's a way to support women who are still disadvantaged in most parts of this world!

lender.name: Don and Cyndi
lender.loan_because: When we needed help, someone was always there for us. Now we can finally return the favor.

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help people

lender.name: iole
lender.loan_because: "the free development of each is the condition for the free development of all"

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired educator and am starting a small textile design business.

lender.name: Pearl
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive contribution to the world community.
lender.occupational_info: I work with staff and community so that people can learn how to use computers and software effectively.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: The small amounts that I can give can make an enormous difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: Jensen
lender.loan_because: I love to help others
lender.occupational_info: I'm just a student. Hanging out with friends, learning new stuff, from school, and from my travels. I get to travel a lot and love to learn all about new lands and new people!

lender.name: George Smart
lender.loan_because: This is an incredible way to make a difference on someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Professional speaker on leadership development, specializing in interactive simulations for audiences of 12 to 400.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.occupational_info: I am a chicken who wears clothing.

lender.name: Jen & Nikolay
lender.loan_because: I can and I should!
lender.occupational_info: Nikolay works for HBO as a freelance graphics designer and Jennie manages a restaurant.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Alot of families in the world are starving, like wise me.I won't oppose that because it seems real and natural.But what vexes me is alot of ignorant people with low ambition. People who gets and never tries to appreciate a return.People who see's other like fools.You can understand how it makes me feel if i was in a lenders shoe. I came up from a family of seven and i'm the first boy of third child in the family.My perents strougled to witness my progress, but it seems the financial bridges is no longer stable.The knew i was multi-talented and they tried the best the could.i so much love them for that. Now the ball is passed over to me and i mistakenly came across the site, in other was, i decide applying.Not for a money lender's money, but for the assistance we coukl render for eachother.I really like to go into great deal in business, and progressively, we will advance every seconds we lay eye on.
lender.occupational_info:
Like i said early on, if i've had the chance of completing my studies, i woulkd descride my work like one big international firm.I everly ready to swing into action with anybody anywhere and accomplish a mission.
I was once a student, but i droped out isn't my intention and i regrete every minute i think about school.than you

lender.name: In memory of Tyler
lender.loan_because: We want to honor the memory of our brave friend.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs, particularly in Latin America.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for running a $65 Million line of business in the Americas (Canada, US, Latin America) for a consulting firm.

lender.name: Spence Halperin
lender.loan_because: A little money can make a big difference to some people.
lender.occupational_info: I help human service organizations raise money and provide excellent services.

lender.name: Boris
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing

lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone has a right to be allowed to help themselves

lender.name: Tedra
lender.loan_because: my heart hurts too much to sit by and do nothing.
lender.occupational_info: I just want to offer an opportunity to someone else to help thank all those that have offered me an opportunity over the years. Best of luck, and I hope it helps. :)

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: The more we can keep the gov't out of our affairs the more successful we become

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: small changes can have giant results
lender.occupational_info: I get the books ready for people to borrow from the library

lender.name: Dean & Jan
lender.loan_because: We want to help people improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Touring the USA

lender.name: Michael J. 2007edition
lender.loan_because: What? Are you kidding me!?! Do I have to explain it to you?!!? With all the social safety nets my country has, RISK should be removed from our vocabulary. The KIVA borrowers have a lot more on the line than just repaying a loan. I respect and admire their courage. .
lender.occupational_info: Graphic design is similar to sculpture and teaching. I take raw elements (letters, photographs, shapes, and colors) and blend them together with the aim of gaining your attention. The goal is to structure information in order to make it's meaning easier to grasp. .

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I was given this opportunity by one of my generous students.
lender.occupational_info: I teach teenagers geography and history.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: God gave every human something called "love," and this is one manifestation of that.

lender.name: Karen & Bert
lender.loan_because:
We feel blessed & called to share..... "They Who Give, Gather."

lender.occupational_info:
Karen is a Family Doc
Bert Trades Stocks & Invests

lender.name: sheree
lender.loan_because: I worked in Kenya when I was young... I remember the peace I felt. I cannot buy that, but I can help!

lender.name: Jim Lyke
lender.loan_because: of the Nobel prize winner who raised public awareness of micro-lending. This seems to be a powerful way of contributing to improve the poverty by helping people to help themselves

lender.name: Kellina & Teri
lender.loan_because: We have a desire to help those in need. We feel that we have been very blessed. It is time to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I (Kellina) am a manager with about 200 employees. I take care of everything from helping customers to repairing the building the store is in. My primary job is just to make certain that the store runs well and that the employees and customers are cared for.

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: Teaching people to fish feeds them for the rest of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach special needs students who have emotional disabilities.

lender.name: Shaun
lender.loan_because: We all need a helping hand. A loan helped me to start my own business.
lender.occupational_info: I operate and maintain large air conditioning equipment.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I've been so fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Central Bank of the United States.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want to create a better world by sharing the wealth because I have been abundantly blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I sell the software that large companies use to build their systems.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: It works!

lender.name: Gregory Ball
lender.loan_because: I hope this can make a difference, and I think the Kiva structure is very good and better than donations to charity.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a high school student involved in many world affairs.

lender.occupational_info: I am self employed, I write computer programs for other companies.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: It makes sense to help the people who are really trying to change their lives.

I enjoy seeing people be able to provide for their family

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: we're here to help each other...

lender.name: Sadie
lender.loan_because: I want others to have resources to take care of their children and have a better life. It is always time to do the right thing.
lender.occupational_info: I assist pharmacies with the processing of their insurance claims. I teach policy regulations

lender.name: Rabia Syed
lender.loan_because: Kiva is awesome!

lender.name: character i
lender.loan_because: It makes sense.
lender.occupational_info: I edit a quarterly literature journal focused on first person narrative poetry, short stories, creative non-fiction, and art.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. Pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: using the pc all day long. Excel and SAP guru.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: It's a sustainable, empowering way to give to charity without creating a cycle of dependency.
lender.occupational_info: I am a counselor for incarcerated teenage girls with drug, alcohol and gang problems.

lender.name: Jess
lender.loan_because: I want to help people. Since I'm young, I think right now this is the best way I can get actively involved... I've donated, but it's nice to actually see the good your money does for an individual.

lender.name: Pouya
lender.loan_because: its easy and i have to.
lender.occupational_info: I design electronic circuits for my employer.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping others help themselves is far more empowering over the long run. A successful business will help sustain a family for generations. I've heard much about microlending since the Noble Prize award. This seems like a terrific program to help people from around the world build sustainable local economies. I'm very glad to be a part of it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an Associate Director in the publishing department of Fitch Ratings, a bond rating company located in the Wall Street area of dowtown Manhattan. I edit/format bond rating reports that are distributed to investors and financial institutions worldwide and posted on the company web site (www.fitchratings.com). Fitch rates financial and government entities that issue debt. For example, if an entity is determined by Fitch analysts to be financially sound, it will receive a favorable rating, and a report will be published to explain the rationale behind the rating. This is where I come in. I help the analysts put together their reports (with style, grammar, fact checking, graphics, etc.). I also oversee the junior editors and work with analytical groups to develop templates for their Research products.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: "I favor the policy of economy, not because I wish to save money, but because I wish to save people. . . economy is idealism in its most practical form." - Calvin Coolidge

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurship is the most powerful tool to change people's lives for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I invest in small start-up companies.

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: I've lived in Nicaragua, Haiti, Barbados and know the importance of giving people the opportunity and resources to make a living with dignity.

lender.name: venu
lender.loan_because: Hi I am websolutions provider based in india , company is doing good , i need lloan to promote my business more . by advertising ,
lender.occupational_info: We provide domain registration webhosting webdesinging .

lender.name: Biren
lender.loan_because: I like to help people that are motivated and want to help themselves. Ultimately, these people will give back to their communities and help others in need.

lender.name: Senior
lender.loan_because:
I'm Captain Planet...and because Gaia (and a couple of teenagers) tell me to.
By the powers combined, I am, CAPTAIN PLANET!
lender.occupational_info: Anti-Pollution Activist

lender.name: Senior
lender.loan_because: it makes my heart tingle with joy and fills my world with rainbows.

lender.loan_because: We care

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: i have the means and others have the need.

lender.name: Wag
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have been born in a country where it is not difficult to earn more money than one person possibly needs.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a not-for-profit social change movement called We Are What We Do. Our ethos is "small actions X lots of people = BIG change"

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I want to help people get to their dreams, and this program helps. I have already done Locks of Love. That is a program where you donate at least 10 inches of hair and people make it into wigs for kids with cancer that have lost all of their hair.
lender.occupational_info: I am a fifth grade student.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance to thrive. Our economic model this world uses sucks, but KIVA gives people a better chance. I'm happy to partner.
lender.occupational_info: I design equipment used by telephone companies to send voice, video and data around the world.

lender.name: Rod
lender.loan_because: I want to help people succeed in their efforts to build their businesses and help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired technical manager. I helped develop and launch into space instruments used to study the Earth's oceans, land and atmosphere.

lender.name: Coite
lender.occupational_info: I cook food and provide it to street vendors in Washington D.C.

lender.name: Kaz
lender.loan_because: I love to help share the love and support I have had all my life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a theater artist. I act, write, direct, produce and teach theater. I have an MFA (Master of Fine Arts) and have produced dozens of my own plays all over the United States.

lender.name: Isabelle
lender.loan_because: I like to help others create riches.

lender.name: Martin & Terry
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to use amounts we can afford to make a difference right across the world. A cliche, but it is a brilliant way to help those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Martin works doing projects for an airline in Dubai and Terry, his wife, consults to a range of companies in Dubai.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Why not? I like helping people.
lender.occupational_info: Im in the military. I do structural maintenance on airplanes.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: I believe in assisting those in need to help themselves out of poverty instead of giving handouts.
lender.occupational_info: Currently helping the elderly remain independent. Soon on my way to Uganda for 2 years with my husband who is volunteering.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than I. I also especially have a soft spot for those countries I have visited that I realize how much they do need help.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: These are people who are eager to succeed by their own efforts and they only need a little help to do just that.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software manuals and help files and make videos about computer software.

lender.name: Sandhya
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Alexandra

lender.name: lisa nima zoya

lender.name: Spencer
lender.loan_because: If you have the ability to help others to obtain better lives, then I believe you should do something.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small Jesuit University and help them to keep track of there finances.

lender.name: mcgrath
lender.loan_because: i think everyone deserves a chance to support their ambitions
lender.occupational_info: i make art, and handicrafts in Los Angeles and have been pretty sucesfull with it, i am also in a band and we get to travel the world sometimes, its not the typical lifestyle for most americans, but i love doing it and i am all about being your own boss!

lender.name: Hewan
lender.loan_because: I would like to "be the change I wish to see in this world" and I intend to do that not over night but through consistant, realistic yet seemingly small contributions.

lender.name: silvia
lender.loan_because: I am french of Paris and I like Argentina

lender.name: Dav
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and help people make changes in their life.

lender.name: Liza
lender.loan_because: There have been times in my own life when a small loan really made a difference. It also seems like a civilized way to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I get to share my favorite music on the radio for other folks to enjoy.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: it means giving back and sharing your earnings with people who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a documentary photographer. I take photos of things I feel really passionately about like the way people live and move, i tell peoples stories. I have documented the way people in the slums in Klongtoei, Bangkok live & the misuse of home brewed alcohol in Papua New Guinea, North American imperialism in Mexico and now I am working on a story on Native Hawaiian people. I love what i do and I believe photographs transcend cultural and language barriers and have the ability to connect people.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: Sometimes a business only needs a small loan and most lenders don't want to bother. But a small loan can mean a great deal to a small business owner.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the office of a community for retired senior citizens.

lender.name: Natasha
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel amazing.. whole.. useful. It reminds me of what I desire to do with my life; empower others.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I want my help to give sustainable results.

lender.name: CRISTI
lender.loan_because: I think this is an opportunity to change the world, one little bit at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Negotiate contracts

lender.name: Doug

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I like Cambodia

lender.name: J Scott
lender.loan_because:
(Insert lyrics to WE ARE THE WORLD).

lender.name: K Allen
lender.loan_because: I am so grateful for everything my family and I have and I like to share with others. I am very impressed with borrowers and their enterprising spirit.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I care!

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to help give people a chance to flourish.

lender.name: Senior
lender.loan_because: I am required to for my class.
lender.occupational_info: Great

lender.name: Margarita
lender.loan_because: Even though I am unemployed from time to time, I am lucky enough to belong to a labor union which provides me with a good wage and safe working conditions. I wish everyone in the world was as fourtunate as I am.
lender.occupational_info: I am a hairstylist for film and television in the Los Angeles area.

lender.name: Rebekah
lender.loan_because: Others have aided me in the past. Now I'm fortunately in the position to provide some small help to other folks around the world!

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: It's a way I can help someone else across the world directly.
lender.occupational_info: I teach communication skills to college students. These skills include public speaking, and the study of nonverbal and interpersonal communication.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: This is such a tremendous idea!!! I love the fact that money that I commit will help for years to come. I look forward to a time when I can be more directly involved.
lender.occupational_info: I support computer systems for a business in the energy industry.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: It's an opportunity to assist others in a highly practical way.
lender.occupational_info: I've had the chance to work in other countries, both in the military and as a Peace Corps volunteer--this site inspires me.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: it does good. At least I hope it does.
lender.occupational_info: I inspire people.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I care about others and dream about ending poverty throughout the world
lender.occupational_info: Real Estate investments and other things I enjoy doing, like writing and painting fine art.

lender.name: Samps
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of lending directly to people, rather than feeding big bureaucracies...
lender.occupational_info: I am an Open Source Software developer... cleaning computers for a living!

lender.name: Jason & Michelle Nonis
lender.loan_because:
The world will be a better place if everyone has the opportunity we have had.
We may move to Palawan some day, so we loan there to help our future friends.
lender.occupational_info: Jason calculates insurance rates using probability and statistics. Matthew, Allyssa, and Quinn's job is to make Mommy's life difficult and Michelle's job is to convince them not to.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because:
First of all, I believed in these entrepreneurs for wanting "to learn how to fish and not just receiving fishes".
It's amazing to see a humble amount equivalent to a lunch can make a difference to an individual or a family's future economic well being.
Lastly, I loan because I hoped to reciprocate the compassion & generosity that I've received from the good samaritans around the world during my years as a political asylum/refugee, somehow, someway.
lender.occupational_info: Paper pushing but would rather work in non profit - philanthropy field instead.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I am so happy to be able to give the opportunity to other women to help bring themselves and their families out of poverty and enjoy some of that unlimited abundance that is there for each and every one of us! It is such a basic right that we all have enough food and shelter in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Health Clinic which offers natural healing modalities such as Chiropractic, Naturopathic , and Massage Therapy.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: There are many in the world less fortunate than I and I hope my small loans help them achieve their goals.

lender.name: Bill & Melanie
lender.loan_because: We are two of the most fortunate people in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses find more efficient ways to ship their product.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women support their families and enjoy the pride of having a successful business. It is a great feeling to be able to support yourself and provide for your family's needs.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a national organization that promotes kindness to animals.

lender.name: Michiel
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is a fantastic idea
lender.occupational_info: Director Software Engineering

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: Microcredit is one promising way out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct research and teaching in the field of development economics at a German university.

lender.name: Eugenia
lender.loan_because: I want to help people have good lives & have enough money for enough food, to send their kids to school, & take care of their parents. I like knowing that my money helps people improve their businesses & overall income, to support their family & community.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: jeff bridges
lender.loan_because: The idea of this organization is appealing to me because it feels very personal to be able to read the stories of the people in need and make a choice. It feels much more personal than blindly giving money to a charity and not knowing how you might have helped someone.
lender.occupational_info: I basically just retouch photos for a stock photo company. Mostly I make people and things look better than they do in real life. Don't believe magazine covers!

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.occupational_info: VP/CFO Water Resources Engineering

lender.occupational_info: It is hard and vey complicated, always depends on the speed of learning, the faster you can learn, the better.

lender.name: Mike

lender.loan_because: I have always created my own success because of meeting the right persons who gave me a little help at the right time. I am grateful and feel blessed and want to share in the blessings.

lender.name: Yvette

lender.name: Bruce & Yvonne

lender.name: Shawn Svoboda-Barber

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunity to help our international neighbors. Since I was born in the US I have opportunities others do not. Helping where I can is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Fawn
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful that I can.

lender.name: Michael

lender.name: Paul

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: it's fun and helpful.

lender.name: Eric and Alanna
lender.loan_because: God has gifted us with so much, and we are blessed so that we can be a blessing to others. This is one easy way to share what we have with others and send God's blessings all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: Alanna is an elementary music teacher and Eric currently works as a pastoral intern at a church, teaching and shepherding kids and teenagers.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: the web of life connects us all - regardless of our means or circumstance
lender.occupational_info: I have been an entrepreneur and worn several hats most of my working career. Today I work one to one with my clients to bring color and add joy inside their home.

lender.name: Michael

lender.occupational_info: I make loans to business men & women here in the United States because like you they are working hard to put food on the table for their family as well

lender.name: The Enders Family
lender.loan_because: Abundance should be shared.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: Helping others is helping oneself.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: This is the kind of charity that changes lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help restaurants use a computer website to keep track of their customers.

lender.name: PensForHope
lender.loan_because:
We promised to strive for justice and peace among all people, and respect the dignity of every human being.
Jesus said: "Love the Lord your God with all your heart, all your mind, and all your strength, and love your neighbor as yourself."
We have been blessed so that we can multiply God's blessings in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are a part of a community of people who try to live as disciples of Christ.

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: I want to advance the kingdom of God in the world... even if it's only a few dollars at a time. I'm tired of stale, ingrown Western Christianity doing nothing for the sake of the rest of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a world-traveling photojournalist seeking to bring awareness of social injustice to a suburban audience. I reallky like writing stuff. Check out my blog!

lender.name: Solomon
lender.loan_because: I want to stretch a helping hand to someone who needs it the most, because I know how it feels to have and to have not
lender.occupational_info: Am an athlete and a farmer, I ran both as a hobby and a source of income. The money I get, I use it as capital for my transport and horticultural ventures.

lender.name: Metz family
lender.loan_because: The money we would spend on a load of groceries in Canada could change someone's future in another country.
lender.occupational_info: We have a very busy restaurant that serves good homemade Mexican food. We have had the built the restaurant ourselves 8 yrs ago and have had to work very hard. Now our business is successful and we can sometimes take holidays and relax.

lender.name: LDS
lender.loan_because: A few dollars can make a huge difference and this is a way for me to remain connected with those outside of the US.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people resolve differences that prevent them from moving forward in life.

lender.name: thealiceline
lender.loan_because: i am a dreamer and an idealist and i want to help people help themselves to be better and do better.

lender.name: Rahul
lender.loan_because: the poor dont need our charity, they need our help. Micro-finance is a way to partner with them and help them help themselves. We owe it to ourselves and to them.

lender.name: Seamus
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help people help themselves. This is an honest hand-up, not a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I offer products and services that my customers find valuable. I do my best to really understand the customer need and find a way we can come together to create value for both of us.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: it is time to stop poverty all over the world - and it's time to become socially aware of what the developed world can do for everyone.

lender.name: Jarvis
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people achieve their dreams and goals in life!!!
lender.occupational_info: Help manage and maintain authorized dealers of my company.

lender.name: Sebastian
lender.occupational_info: l buy electronic appliances from china to Ghana!

lender.name: Mandy & Adam
lender.loan_because: We can help facilitate effective change in peoples lives.

lender.name: The White Family
lender.loan_because: It's only fair. We've been so lucky.
lender.occupational_info: Carrie teaches at a local school and John works with computers.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: It is a wonderful feeling when someone believes in you and your ability to succeed.

lender.name: Angie
lender.loan_because: I can! I want to help people who want to help themselves out of poverty. Giving money to charity is just sticking a band-aid on the wound of poverty. By lending money through Kiva we can directly help people to build better lives for themselves, their families and their community.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I want to help create the change I'd like to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I study brain activity associated with human emotion and information processing. I hope this work will help us understand and treat depression better.

lender.name: Tony Wheeler
lender.loan_because: small things done with great love will change the world.

lender.name: Carlo
lender.loan_because: i can.
lender.occupational_info: manage projects and solutions for TELCO/IT company.

lender.name: Art
lender.loan_because: At a time when many people feel powerless to make a difference, my partner Heidi and I knew this was one way we could use our privilege to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Art is a diversity consultant and Student Affairs staff member. Heidi is a School Librarian.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: this is a wonderful, and easy, way to help others who want to help themselves! God bless the folks at Kiva for keeping this program going!
lender.occupational_info: I teach Special Needs Early Childhood Ed. My students range in ages from 2 years 9 months to 5 years old and can have any variety of developmental delays. By providing education and therapy services at the earliest ages, there is the greatest impact on a child's development and progress.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I belive everyone deserves a chance to succeed

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: We're all in this world together
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team that creates television news with a focus on human rights, values, and freedoms, with special consideration to human rights abuses by the Chinese regime.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: It's easy and it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I play drums in a touring rock band for a living. I'm one of the lucky ones.

lender.name: John
lender.whereabouts: St Leonards On Sea East Sussex
lender.occupational_info: Making planes fly and similar.

lender.name: Portia
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: Economic researcher focused on poverty and development.

lender.name: Donna & Glen
lender.loan_because: We grew up in Appalachia and know first hand the hopes, dreams and needs of these people and are thankful to be able to help them help themselves.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs to be given a chance to prove what they can do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a visiting Nurse. I travel to people's home and help them get well at home, or to be able to stay at home instead of being in the hospital.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for what I have and would like to help others.
lender.occupational_info: rewarding

lender.name: Genevieve
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate to travel to places like Cambodia and Vietnam and see the tenacity of the human spirit. It takes so very little to help another soul out who is determined to make their life better. We all benefit by extending a helping hand in the spirit of love and community.
lender.occupational_info: I'm lucky enough to be in a job that allows me to teach youth. They keep me humble and teach me the joys of living each day to the fullest.

lender.name: tamsin
lender.loan_because: access to inexpensive credit is a fundamental right, allowing individuals and families the opportunity to create a future for themselves. I want to support this because it helps communities grow and prosper. Kiva represents the way that banking should work, building relationships with the borrower and understanding their needs. While governments pour yet more money into failed big banks that pay ridiculous amounts to their investment managers, Kiva shows what responsible lending means.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I think micro lending is a fantastic idea and I'm grateful for the opportunity to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Search Engine Optimization consultant. I optimize the content and structure of client websites in order to increase the amount of relevant traffic they receive from Google, Yahoo, MSN, etc.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: so little can make such a big difference in the lives of others.

lender.name: Colin and Mary
lender.loan_because: we are fortunate enough to be able to.

lender.name: rusty @ scooby
lender.occupation: always trying to do the right thing
lender.loan_because: How can you not help people who are trying to make a better life for themselves and their family.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: It helps make a difference in someone's life

lender.name: Smith Family
lender.loan_because: America has lost its moral authority due to our regrettable choices of politicians. Kiva is one small step towards repairing our tarnished image.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: $25.00 can change someone's life.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I remember when all I needed was just $50...
lender.occupational_info: I help companies that are in crisis speak to the public.

lender.name: Isabel
lender.loan_because: I try to be there for others the way people have been there for me in my life. Passing on support and encouragement is the greatest gift you can give to someone.

lender.name: Nancy and Edward
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: difficult,physically demanding,

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people make a life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 7th grade English and Spanish.

lender.name: Christian Garcia
lender.loan_because: only by giving away what I have can I keep it.
lender.occupational_info: I solve problems all day while sitting in a box for more than 8 hours at a time.

lender.name: sapientsaphead
lender.loan_because: I lived in a third world country surrounded by poverty and understand how much this could help them.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: it's a way for us to directly help people in a way that is meaningful to them.
lender.occupational_info: I teach courses at a University and do research. My interest is in sustainability.

lender.name: lynn
lender.loan_because: giving is receiving.

lender.name: Craig & Lori
lender.loan_because: It is a simple way to empower people, break the cycle of poverty, help others, and show Jesus' love to people around the world. We're so grateful for our blessings, and we're so happy to do what we can for others.

lender.name: Boyd
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Design and develop remote sensing instrument to measure pollution in the atmosphere and help companies reduce emissions.

lender.name: Thornton Family
lender.loan_because: Maybe we can make a difference in some small way.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: other people matter, to God and to me.

lender.name: Blair
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a fair shot in life, and if a little bit of money is all that it takes, then why shouldn't I try to help?

lender.name: Annette
lender.occupational_info: Newspaper editor

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: a small contribution from me is a world of difference for another.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves opportunity.

lender.name: Tom Tom
lender.loan_because: When i was a kid, I got a loan from a retired Air Force pilot to start my lemonade and candy stand, I made a lot of money for a kid and paid him back.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I work as a private educator. Most teachers have 30 students, I have one.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: it seems to be one of the better ways I can help people less fortunate than me
lender.occupational_info: I work in the field of climate change and energy access - trying to reduce the pace of climate change by limiting carbon emissions whilst at the same time ensuring greater access to clean and affordable energy.

lender.name: RyRy
lender.loan_because:
I've struggled to make a better life for my family, and I know what a positive impact just one person can make. I give because I know what it's like to be on the receiving end.
Be the change you wish to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm blessed with a great husband and a wonderful 3 year old son. I'm working towards getting a college degree.

lender.name: Naomi, Eli and Miriam
lender.loan_because: acts of loving kindness are part of our faith.
lender.occupational_info: Everyday we find new ways to drive Mommy and Abba crazy.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to better themselves.

lender.name: Brianna
lender.loan_because: It makes me hopeful.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a surveyor. I help make sure that the land you think you're buying is actually the land you're getting. =)

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their potential and realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Banking supevision

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: This is an amazing program! I can assist someone across the world in becoming self-sufficient. It's not a big thing that I do, but I can make a dent in the trouble the world sees. That's a great feeling.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.occupation: I work in the exhibit department of a museum
lender.loan_because: I want to be an example to my grand-daughters for sharing what we have.

lender.name: Lowie Jay
lender.loan_because: This is what we are supposed to be doing to someone in need. It makes our planet EARTH a better place to live.......
lender.occupational_info: 6th Grade taking advance algebra. I also take karate class everyday and play saxophone and clarinet

lender.name: George K
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: As a "pull yourself up by your bootstraps" proponent, I thought I'd put some money where my mouth is.

lender.name: Laia and Damon
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Microcredit helps people help themselves.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: "Give to him who asks of you, and do not turn away from him who wants to borrow from you." Matthew 5:42

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It's a way to help others and it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: capitalism works.

lender.name: Anand
lender.loan_because: I want to bring about positive change in the darkest corners of the world.
lender.occupational_info: Consultant

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I get paid to be jetlagged.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I want to help others succeed, and this seems like a great way help out.
lender.occupational_info: I help develop and support financial management systems for a health care provider.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I beleive that by giving, I receive.
lender.occupational_info: Labor market research and technology

lender.name: Kari
lender.loan_because: I was randomly born into a fortunate life.
lender.occupational_info: I look for ways to engage businesses in UNESCO development projects, in particular projects that teach children and communities about ways to live a more sustainabile life.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.occupational_info: I study child-computer interaction and educational media, focusing on interface design, usability, and assistive technology.

lender.name: ytsuboi
lender.loan_because: As citizens of the Japan, we are incredibly blessed. Everyone has the right to create their own financial future and because I am fortunate enough to be able to give back.

lender.name: bezouska
lender.loan_because: supporting the entrepreneurial spirit is the best possible way to help people to help themselves. (and of course because i feel this is the right thing to do ...)
lender.occupational_info: i run a consulting company focused on business consulting, project management and information security

lender.name: Otani
lender.loan_because: I wish to help whom I would like to come to the rescue of poverty, as far as I could manage.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to do quality work in Contractor business such as plant construction like Urea plant, Refineries and pipeline.

lender.name: Tone
lender.loan_because: I like to be able to help people who are willing to help themselves. The great part about Kiva is that once a loan is repaid, the lenders can lend that money out again to another deserving entrepreneur. It's a nice cycle.
lender.occupational_info: I lend money to small businesses (no really, that is what I do for a living!). However, I usually lend other people's money to much larger, established businesses; participating in Kiva allows me to lend my own money to microbusinesses in developing countries.

lender.name: Isbjorn
lender.loan_because: We believe giving a loan makes people stand on their own legs as they are making an investment in their own future.
lender.occupational_info: We import high-quality Omega-3 products to Taiwan.

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: Its an incredible oppurtunity to both help and teach essential skills. Its very easy to help and even small amounts of money can make a huge diffrence.
lender.occupational_info: im just a sophmore in high school. but i work at a grocery store by my house in the mountains.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people begin their new lives as I was helped by others when I started mine.
lender.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs focus on their business instead of their workload.

lender.name: Danali- a kivafriend
lender.loan_because: it is a good cause and it is important for other people to have the choices that are avalible to me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school student living in Berkeley, CA. I have 2 cats and I love to read.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I love business and want to make a difference in the world for the kids of tomorrow.
lender.occupational_info: I am a senior accountant in a group of textile manufacturing companies in Scotland.

lender.name: Lutfi
lender.loan_because: I believe that anyone that is willing to work hard should be given the chance to better her / his life :)

lender.name: Yvette & Bonnie
lender.loan_because: We loan to help others so they can have a better life and because we know it isn't always easy.
lender.occupational_info: Yvette is in 7th grade and Bonnie works at the University of Florida.

lender.name: Stefanie
lender.loan_because: I have travelled and see how a small sacrifice on my part can have a huge impact for others.
lender.occupational_info: I sell coffee drinks in the outdoor markets during the summer months.

lender.name: AllPeopleBeHappy
lender.occupation: Family and Friends of Eric Tang
lender.loan_because: To remember Eric Tang. Microlending was one of his passions and contributing to Kiva keeps his spirit alive.

lender.name: Mollie & boys
lender.loan_because: not everyone can qualify for loans with large institutions, but it takes very little from each private person to support a GOAL!
